ShortDescription.Value: Provides more options to control various city settings.

Publish.LongDescription:
# City Controller
## All functions of this mod are in the development stage.
### Features - Automatic add money, manual add/subtract money, unlimited money and limited money conversion. - Custom milestone. - Notification icon displayed/hidden.
### Plans - Custom unlock. - City service control, fire, death, etc. - Any interesting features?
### Translation This mod provides the same custom mod language as Cities Skylines 1, but the translation needs to be improved by volunteers.
### Feedback Give feedback through discord or via GitHub.
Publish.ChangeLog: ## [0.2.1] - Added company, disaster, fire, garbage, work provider, healthcare, police, pollution, resource consumer, route, transport line notification icon toggle function. - Code optimization.
